sentences.en: A slice of veal weighing 2 1 / 2 kilogrammes costs 142 francs.
sentences.cn: 一条嫩牛肉重2.5千克,价值是142法郎.

sentences.en: And can you put in some veal and some pork with it?
sentences.cn: 能不能在里面加上点羊肉和猪肉?

sentences.en: Captain McCluskey was eating the plate of veal and spaghetti that had arrived.
sentences.cn: 警官麦克罗斯基在专心地吃着刚端上来的那盘小牛肉细条实心面.

sentences.en: I had veal cutlets for supper.
I put the veal scallops into the refrigerator before they could spoil.
sentences.cn: 在小牛肉可能变质前,我把它们搁在冰箱里.

sentences.en: Marinate the veal in white wine for two hours.
sentences.cn: 把小牛肉用白葡萄酒浸泡两小时.

sentences.en: Roast breast of veal every Sunday with bread stuffing like clay was due to my disorders.
sentences.cn: 每个星期日的烤小牛肉和面包吃起来象粘土,这也全因我的生活杂乱无章.

sentences.en: Season veal and pan - fry till brown on both sides.
sentences.cn: 将小牛排以调味料腌制后煎至两面金黄色.

sentences.en: She sauteed veal and peppers, preparing a mixed salad while the pan simmered.
sentences.cn: 她先做的一道菜是青椒煎小牛肉, 趁着锅还在火上偎着的机会,又做了一道拼盘.

sentences.en: Sollozzo reassured him . " Try the veal, it's the finest in New York . "
sentences.cn: 索洛佐 再一次向他保证这里的饭菜很好.

sentences.en: This veal looks nice, though . It reminds me of lean pork.
sentences.cn: 小牛肉看上去还不错, 使我想起瘦肉来.

sentences.en: Veal has been served in national dishes all across Europe centuries.
sentences.cn: 小牛肉数个世纪来一直出现在欧洲各国的菜肴之中.

sentences.en: Veal is too delicate for a spicy sauce.
sentences.cn: 小牛肉清淡可口不宜多加调料.

sentences.en: We drove through three time zones for veal scaloppini?
sentences.cn: 我们开过三个时区就为了吃煎小牛肉?

sentences.en: While you were busy a deal, the dog a peace of veal.
sentences.cn: 忙谈生意时, 狗已叼走了肉;顾此失彼.

trans.tran_en: the meat of a calf(= a young cow )
